Html:
Hello,

I have been trying to export XLSX to PDF but there are problem, that any borders aren't showing up in pdf output. I read some of discussions - it seems that issue has been around for a while. Question is - is there any workaround for this ? If not, is there any chance it can be implemented in the future ? Otherwise, I am sure, that many people will find PDF package useless. 

Thanks, anyway, for great product!

Rgs,
 Andis
